snippet: A judge is placing four former Blackwater Worldwide guards together in a trial that is scheduled to begin on June 11 in the killings of 14 Iraqi civilians and the injuring of at least 18 others in Baghdad....

headline.print_headline: 4 Defendants Back Together in Blackwater Case
headline.main: 4 Defendants Back Together in Blackwater Case

lead_paragraph: A judge is placing four former Blackwater Worldwide guards together in a trial that is scheduled to begin on June 11 in the killings of 14 Iraqi civilians and the injuring of at least 18 others in Baghdad.
